articles.title: University of Nottingham needs volunteers for Covid-19 vaccine trials - Nottinghamshire Live
articles.description: 'This trial will test whether the Covid-19 vaccine can provide protection in the wider population'
articles.content:
The University of Nottingham has begun its recruitment process for its human trials "of huge importance" which aim to find an effective vaccine for Covid-19.

articles.title: Hypertension: How a hormone called aldosterone may have been the cause of your high blood pressure - Firstpost
articles.description: If the adrenal glands produce too much aldosterone, it can cause the body to retain sodium and lose potassium which can lead to high blood pressure.

articles.title: 'Red' heat wave alert in North India: Best foods to eat during a heatwave - Times of India
articles.description: As the temperatures continue to soar, the Indian Meteorological Department issued a red alert across states in the country sounding a heatwave, asking people to stay at home.

articles.title: With big talk and hurled insults, the gloves come off in the race for the coronavirus vaccine - CNN
articles.description: Ethicists and physicians are concerned that, amid a desire to put an end to the Covid-19 pandemic, developers of drugs and vaccines have become overly enthusiastic about the chances their products will work.
